statements: DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE product_name = 'Product A' AND sales_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE sales_quantity >= 1000 AND sales_amount > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100 AND sales_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 100 AND sale_price > 500.00;
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND product_name LIKE '%Shoes%';
DELETE FROM Products WHERE category_id = 2 AND product_name = 'ExampleProduct';
DELETE FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND unit_price > 1000;
